metadata.title: CVE-2021-31542 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In Django 2.2 before 2.2.21, 3.1 before 3.1.9, and 3.2 before 3.2.1, MultiPartParser, UploadedFile, and FieldFile allowed directory traversal via uploaded files with suitably crafted file names.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-31542` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:2.2.20-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.20-1ubuntu0.1').
